content: उच्चावच {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मयूरव्यंसकादिगण] {@--1@} High and low, uneven, irregular, undulating; <ls>Ms. 6. 73.</ls> {@--2@} Great and small, variegated, heterogeneous. {@--3@} Various, multiform, of various kinds, diverse; उच्चावचाश्च पदार्था भवंतीति गार्ग्यः <ls>Nir.</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 38</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 46</ls>; <ls>Dk. 48</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">104</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">156.</ls>
